title: The Herd-HOUR-3-NBA bubble
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-3-NBA bubble
description:
Colin gives his thoughts on the NBA bubble so far, and why higher seeds have a disadvantage.


Guest: Peter Schrager, Jim Jackson
